body_content.explanation: not a student at or part of a college:
examples: He attended Oxford as a non-collegiate student.
It was a non-collegiate body of the university, and had no buildings of its own.

body_content.explanation: (of a university) not consisting of colleges:
examples: It has grown to become one of the largest non-collegiate universities in Britain.
You can also gain academic credit for work done in noncollegiate institutions.

body_content.explanation: not related to studying at a college:
examples: The university has hosted collegiate and non-collegiate events.
Evidence of learning from non-collegiate programs can be applied toward academic credit.
